name: Resin Removal
overrideDescription: Remove all [debuff] effects from friendly units and all [buff] effects from enemy units.

additionalTooltips.title: Debuff
additionalTooltips.description: Debuff effects are generally negative for their target and are represented by red icons.

additionalTooltips.title: Buff
additionalTooltips.description: Buff effects are generally positive for their target and are represented by green icons.

cardLoreTooltips: When wax hardens into resin, it is possible to chip away the crystallized exterior to expose the soft wax underneath. The process does not come without risks, though.
